snippet.title: Everdine - a lost girl's tale  (Mini Trailer / RPG Maker Horror Adventure Game)
snippet.description:
This is a mini trailer for my indie game Everdine - a lost girl's tale, which will release on November 18th, 2022. 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1687710/Everdine__A_Lost_Girls_Tale/
Itchio: https://plueschkatze.itch.io/everdine
Release Date: November 18th, 2022. 

Everdine finds herself lost in a forest of eternal twilight. Help her gather the needed ingredients to perform a magic ritual to escape before the dangers of these woods devour poor Everdine. ~ An atmospheric, fairy tale vibes RPG Maker horror adventure. 

Inspired by such classic RPG Maker Horror Games as Ib, Witch's House, Mad Father etc. And by fantasy, folklore and fairy tales! 

Music used in this trailer is by John Leonard French, from their music pack Complete Horror.
